bibl.title: The Alcestis Papyrus Revisted.
bibl.note: Revised text, translation, remarks. Lecture delivered at the University of Heidelberg in December 1984. A full commentary will appear in ANRW. - Cf. Wolfgang Dieter Lebek, On Marcovich's Alcestis, ZPE 65 (1986) pp. 59-60.
bibl.seg: Marcovich Miroslav, The Alcestis Papyrus Revisted.

Revised text, translation, remarks. Lecture delivered at the University of Heidelberg in December 1984. A full commentary will appear in ANRW. - Cf. Wolfgang Dieter Lebek, On Marcovich's Alcestis, ZPE 65 (1986) pp. 59-60.
